sentences: Full Stack Software Developer (Remote)

Here at Robert Half, we are delighted to have partnered with one of the largest independent law firms in Europe, to recruit for a Full Stack Developer to join their team based in Bristol (remote working with once a month in the office in Bristol)

This business works with clients at the forefront of technical development in the Engineering, Biotechnology and Electronics sectors, where you will play a key part in developing systems and applications for both those clients and internal stakeholders
This is a unique opportunity for an intuitive and passionate developer to join a tech agnostic environment, where you are given the autonomy to work with a variety of technologies
Role

As a Full Stack Developer, you will work as part of a small, Agile team, collaborating with colleagues across the wider business, assisting with large scale solutions as well as leading your own projects - this includes having the opportunity to influence the technologies used for specific solutions
The business has a keen eye for automation and is on a journey to automate as much of the business as possible while building on a microservices architecture
Some of your responsibilities will be as follows:
Understanding the systems development design requirements
Designing, coding, and testing relatively complex functionality
Ensuring version control and deployment procedures are followed consistently
Having a proactive approach to identifying and investigating issues
Ensuring standard procedures and best practises are followed
Working closely with the Senior Developer to keep then up to date on the status of development and any potential delays or risks
Competencies:
Exceptional problem solving and technical capabilities
Positive "can do" attitude with excellent communication skills
Intelligent and proactive approach to any work assigned
Technical skills:
Experience with C#/
NET
Experience with
NET Core, including Entity Framework
Knowledge of both creating and consuming REST APIs
Desirable:
Experience with React
Salary & Benefits

The Full Stack Developer will receive a salary of £50,000 to £65,000, plus excellent benefits including remote working, with once a month in the Bristol office, as well as the opportunity for continuous and fast-paced career development, rewarding you as you develop your skills
If you like the sound of this exciting opportunity, or have any questions at all, then please feel free to reach out to me by phone on 0117 993 5427
